T02TD1721E:89a-0: @89a # // rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1721E:89a-2: ltos pa thams cad rab spangs te //
T02TD1721E:89a-3: ci 'byor mchod pa sngon du bya //
T02TD1721E:89a-4: byang chub sems ni brtan par bsgom //
T02TD1721E:89a-5: 'byung bzhi thim pa lha bzhir bsgom //
T02TD1721E:89a-6: rnam shes thim pa yid kyi lha //
T02TD1721E:89a-8: bskyed rim thim pa rdzogs rim bsgom //
T02TD1721E:89a-9: lus kyi shed nyams smig rgyu snang //
T02TD1721E:89a-10: snying gar bla ma bsgom par bya //
T02TD1721E:89a-11: sgo dgu skam sa na du ba 'byung //
T02TD1721E:89b-0: lte bar rdo rje sems dpa' @89b bsgom ;
T02TD1721E:89b-1: / drod brtul srin bu me khyer 'dra //
T02TD1721E:89b-2: gsang bar don yod grub pa bsgom //
T02TD1721E:89b-3: dbugs chad mar me 'bar ba mthong //
T02TD1721E:89b-4: smin mtshams rta mgrin bsgom par bya //
T02TD1721E:89b-5: srog bral nam mkha' 'dra ba la //
T02TD1721E:89b-6: thams cad 'dus pa lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1721E:89b-8: rang gis ji ltar bzod ltar bsgom //
T02TD1721E:89b-9: mthar ni pha ma'i sa bon gnyis //
T02TD1721E:89b-10: dkar dmar thig le nyi zlar gyur //
T02TD1721E:89b-11: kha sbyar dbus su rang gi sems //
T02TD1721E:89b-12: srog gi sa bon t'am yig blta //
T02TD1721E:89b-15: bcu gnyis mdzad pa mthar phyung ste //
T02TD1721E:89b-17: gson tshe srog rtsol la brten nas //
T02TD1721E:89b-18: thim pa bdun ni rim bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1721E:89b-20: ma brjed tsam gyis 'grub par bzhed //
T02TD1721E:89b-21: rje btsun a'arya t'a ra'i man ngag la brten nas 'chi ka ma'i nyams len dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i kha che sh'akya shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
